Articles.Content:
I was thinking that some "story" contracts would definitely improve the game and I'm probably not alone. One of them would be the long a unanimously coveted magic boulder.

After upgrading the tracking station to max level a series of contracts would become available:

  1. Find the source of strange radiation near Ike.
  2. Recover science from it.
  3. Bring the boulder into Kerbin's orbit
  4. Attach a science lab to the boulder

...or something similar. Even just having a unique asteroid pop up there would be a good thing as the previous easter eggs really livened up the game.

Of course adding new ones would be just as good.
Hey, one of the contract ideas breaks the,first law when dealing with the magic boulder. Do not touch the magic boulder!
